decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (S1/2016029/000, S1/2016029/01, S1/2016029/02, S1/2016029/03, S1/2016029/04, S1/2016029/05, S1/2016029/0, S1/2016029/07 and  Design and Access Statement  Received: 1 March 2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The resultant property shall not be occupied other than as a single family dwellinghouse (Use Class C3) or as a small house in multiple occupancy HMO (Use Class C4) where facilities such as bathroom(s) or kitchen(s) are shared by between three to six unrelated individuals.
description: Demolition of an existing side extension and erection of a two storey side extension
